channel.title: Looking for Development Team, New Coders or Experienced!
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently looking for New or Experienced coders for a RSPS, Im starting a 317 and already have a 753 Online RSPS.. my 753 is currently online with a VPS! So whichever you would prefer helping me code doesnt matter. [b]I have medium experience[/b], and looking for a couple people to help me code, whether your new and want to learn as you go or experienced and want to build a RSPS Community.
Some Features in 753: Drygores, Prestige System, All Minigames and bosses, ALL Skills working)
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2wohwyr.png[/img]
as for the 317, i have plenty of sources (Delta, PI..etc) just dont know which to use because none seem to be very good. So if you want to help me with this one, much work will be needed.
[font=comic sans ms][size=24pt][u][b]If you are interested apply here:[/b][/u][/size][/font] [i][b]Name: Skype: Experience: 317 or 753: What times are you on and for how long: What would you want in return of coding: What do you offer for server (Server editing, Client editing, GFX):[/b][/i]
[b]My Skype[/b]: [u][size=14pt]suckdznuts[/size][/u]

item.title: Looking for Development Team, New Coders or Experienced!
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Name: Dalton

Skype: Deadlyhorror (added you)

Experience: About 3 years or so, I’ve owned, coded, and hosted a few servers before and I am Intermediate when it concerns coding. I will be able to talk more on skype.

317 or 753: Either, I can code the 317 myself but I can always tag along on the 753 if needed.

What times are you on and for how long: Anytime after about 8am CST, all day.

What would you want in return of coding: Co-owner or developer, can discuss on skype.

What do you offer for server (Server editing, Client editing, GFX): I can do server editing, client editing, cache editing, and a bit of GFX if needed.

[center]-It’d be nice to hear back from you,
Deadlyhorror15 || Gaming-Revamped[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for Development Team, New Coders or Experienced!

item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“digerman, post:4, topic:539517”]yeah, i was co-owner of soulsplit back in about 2010

Edit: Sorry for my mistake in the other post “2012”[/quote]

False. Now go die. I’m an ex-SS client dev. I know Pim and I’ve been talking to him for months.

item.title: Looking for Development Team, New Coders or Experienced!
item.dc:creator: @digerman digerman
item.description:
@digerman wrote:

Name: Sebastian
Skype: Jagex-editer
Experience: My experience is kinda hard to tell, I have been coding and hosting several servers, ex-co owner of soulsplit back in 2010, I work with a large range of server deobs, mostly 317, 474, 718/742
317 or 753:as said before 317, 474, 718/742
What times are you on and for how long: I’m usually online 6 - 8 houres every day, i dont know the time zone crap, but i can tell i am from Denmark.
What would you want in return of coding: Split donations incomming to the server.
What do you offer for server (Server editing, Client editing, GFX): I offer server editing, client editing, and VPS hosting on my own VPS.

Read full topic
